Laurent Cars's work office is surrounded by a wall of windows that allow the light in to the room to be filtered through a series of glass panes. To get to work every day, Laurent Cars has to walk a mile to get from the office to his car. It takes him two hours and a half to get to the office from his home in the suburbs of Montreal.
